oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Southern Cross of Honor pin belonging to Wilson Frost, Jr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Southern Cross of Honor pin belonging to Wilson Frost, Jr., issued by the United Daughters of the Confederacy. Born Nov. 14, 1846; died Jan.21, 1925 in Yalobusha Co., Miss. Buried in Millers Chapel Cemetery in Bonicord, Dyer County, Tenn. He was the son of Wilson Frost and his second wife, Lucintha Baker Tournage. Frost served in Co. F, 15th Tenn. Cav., CSA. He married Marguerite Bryn/e and they had seven children. The owner is Frost's great grandaughter.
